name: Ropémon
description:
Introduction

Ropémon is a monster capturing game in only 64x64 pixels which was created for the LowRezJam 2021.

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys
Talk and Confirm: Space
Throw a rope: Enter

General Tips

The village is located in the middle of the map, in case you get lost try to find one of the sand paths as they will lead you back.
The woman in the western part of the village can heal your Ropémon (she does this automatically when you talk to her). You can change your current team here too, use the arrow keys to navigate the menu and space to (de)select a Ropémon. You can have up to three in your team.
